examples.example: 周末我和朋友们一起去打球，那真是一件令人开心的事情。

translate.english: On the weekend, I go to play ball with my friends, that is really a delightful thing.

examples.example: 我喜欢在周末和家人一起去打球，享受欢乐的时光。

translate.english: I like to play ball with my family on weekends and enjoy the happy time.

examples.example: 我经常约上好友一起去打球，这既锻炼了身体又增进了我们之间的友谊。

translate.english: I often ask my friends to play ball together, which not only exercises the body but also enhances the friendship between us.
